person:biography.personal-details:content:
I am a doctorate student at the department of Shipping and Marine Technology at Chalmers University of Technology, in Gothenburg. I started my studies in June 2011 and they are expected to end in May 2016, according to the standard 5 years duration of doctoral education in Sweden. The main focus of my doctoral studies lies in the analysis, modeling and optimisation of ship energy systems.
Educated at the University of Bologna in Energy Technology (Bachelor degree in 2008, Master degree in 2011), my main area of expertise and interest are applied thermodynamics, sustainable energy systems, and marine propulsion systems.
